titleStmt.title: Directions left by a gentleman to his sonns for the improvement of barren and healthy land in England and Wales.
titleStmt.author: Reeve, Gabriel.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E.T. and R.H. for R. Royston ...,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: pages cropped, stained and creased with some loss of print. Copy (tightly bound) from Union Theological Seminary Library spliced at end.
Running title reads: Directions for improvement of barren and healthy land.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
